description: Hurricane Milton has “explosively” intensified, with maximum sustained winds of 175 mph, according to the National Hurricane Center. NBC News' Al Roker has the latest forecast and Jesse Kirsch reports from Sarasota, Fla., with how locals are preparing.
title: Hurricane Milton 'explosively intensifies' with 175 mph winds

description: Republican and Democratic politicians and officials have in recent days resorted to pleading with people to stop spreading false information related to Hurricane Helene, with many saying that rumors and conspiracy theories are hampering recovery efforts.
title: Public officials urge halt to the spread of rampant disinformation around Hurricane Helene

description: Hurricane Milton has strengthened to a Category 5 storm as it approaches Florida's Gulf Coast and is expected to make landfall Wednesday. NBC News' Dana Griffin and Bill Karins report on the storm's path and how residents are reacting.
title: Hurricane Milton strengthens to a Category 5 storm

description: Hurricane and storm surge watches are in effect for Florida’s Gulf Coast as Hurricane Milton is expected to make landfall Wednesday. NBC News’ Melissa Parra reports how communities already affected by Hurricane Helene are bracing Milton, which has now strengthened to a Category 4 hurricane.
title: Hurricane Milton strengthens to a Category 4 storm

description: The Supreme Court rejected an appeal by Elon Musk's social media company X, declining to decide whether prosecutors should have obtained data from Trump's Twitter account without him being notified.
title: Supreme Court turns away Elon Musk's X appeal over Trump criminal investigation

description: Antisemitic incidents in the U.S. increased 200% in less than one year from the Oct. 7 attacks to September 2024, according to data collected by the ADL Center on Extremism. ADL Center on Extremism Vice President Oren Segal spoke with NBC News’ Christine Roman about why Jewish individuals and institutions were targeted even one day after the attacks.
title: Why antisemitic incidents tripled in the U.S. after the Oct. 7 attacks

description: Israelis are commemorating one year since the Oct. 7 terror attacks and its military assault on Gaza while Hamas and Hezbollah mark the day by vowing to continue the fighting. NBC News’ Matt Bradley reports that after one year, no real resolution has been made in a conflict leaving the region war torn.
title: Israel marks one year since Oct. 7 attacks as Hamas and Hezbollah vow to fight on

description: Many gathered for an emotional memorial at the site of the music festival in Israel where Hamas launched a surprise terror attack on Oct. 7, 2023 where thousands were killed and hundreds taken hostage. NBC’s Raf Sanchez reports for TODAY from Israel.
title: Israel honors victims of Oct. 7 attacks with emotional memorial

description: Memorials are being held around the world marking one year since Hamas launched a surprise terror attack at a music festival in Israel where thousands were killed and injured and hundreds more were taken hostage. The attack sparked a devastating war in Gaza that has spiraled to other parts of the Middle East. NBC’s Richard Engel reports for TODAY.
title: Israel marks 1-year anniversary of Oct. 7 terror attacks by Hamas

description: Osama Muhammad Abu Mustafa was convinced he would become an international soccer superstar.
title: In Gaza, children who survive Israel’s assault face a lifetime of trauma

description: Life-threatening storm surges are due to hit Florida's Gulf Coast this week with the arrival of Hurricane Milton, which is strengthening over the southern Gulf of Mexico and set to make landfall as a powerful Category 3 storm on Wednesday.
title: Hurricane Milton strengthens, triggers storm surge warnings for Florida's Gulf Coast
